name: Number Theory
description: studying gcd, lcm, divisors, prime factorization, etc...

name: Foundations: Data, Data, Everywhere
description: Define and explain key concepts involved in data analytics including data, data analysis, and data ecosystem.Discuss the role of spreadsheets, query languages, and data visualization tools in data analytics.Conduct an analytical thinking self assessment giving specific examples of the application of analytical thinking.

name: Marketing Analytics Foundation
description: This course lays the foundation of marketing analytics. You’ll learn the basic principles of marketing. You’ll learn the role analytics plays in digital marketing and how data is collected and managed for marketing. You will also learn basic privacy regulations that govern the online marketing space as well as common challenges when working with marketing data.

name: Practical Data Scienceonthe AWSCloudSpecialization
description: Prepare data, detect statistical data biases, perform feature engineering at scale to train models, & train, evaluate, & tune models with AutoML. Build, deploy, monitor, & operationalize end-to-end machine learning pipelines. Store & manage ML features using a feature store, & debug, profile, tune, & evaluate models while tracking data lineage and model artifacts
